body: If I say `sparse_sum(float_tensor, kDouble)`, do I want the accumulation to be done in double precision? Seems likely to me. But that's not what this code does.
body_html: If I say sparse_sum(float_tensor, kDouble), do I want the accumulation to be done in double precision? Seems likely to me. But that's not what this code does.
